response.overview: ‘Kemra’ is a long, wonderful look into the life of a village in Ladakh, and the manner in which a sense of community operates within it. The same is presented to us by way of Neha, a girl from the city, or as the locals call it, from “down”, who has ended up living at the house of a villager, due to an unexpected alignment of the different variables of her trip. She is a documentary filmmaker who spends her time interacting and interviewing those around her. Consequently, our introduction to this close-knit community is executed through the many interactions she has with it.
response.title: kemra

release_dates.note: The Himalayan Film Festival 2023 I 2nd Edition
